function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased time spent cooking and eating at home leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases in the kitchen","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases within the household","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce surface contamination and promote hygiene practices in the kitchen","Technologies":"Contactless and touchless technologies for appliances and faucets, voice activation technology","People":"Families and individuals spending more time in the kitchen","Owner":"Homeowners, designers, and architects"},{"Description":"Fomite transmission of COVID-19 through contaminated surfaces in households","Impact":"Risk of indirect transmission of COVID-19 through touch contamination","Mitigation":"Adopting touchless household technologies and regular disinfection of surfaces","Technologies":"Touchless appliances and fixtures, remote-controlled devices, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Household members and visitors","Owner":"Homeowners and homeowners associations"},{"Description":"Survival of the coronavirus on various household surfaces","Impact":"Risk of prolonged presence of the virus on frequently touched surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of high-touch surfaces and adoption of antimicrobial materials","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection devices, contactless fixtures and appliances","People":"Household members and visitors","Owner":"Homeowners and homeowners associations"}]}
